item.description:
At this meeting we will be discussing The End of America by Naomi Wolfe.

We will put this book within the context of the films THE MONEY MASTERS and IOUSA.

Refreshments will be served.
Free Admission

Please show up even if you have not read the book and Please bring a friend!

NOTE: Do not call the library - they are fed up with screening calls for this book club!
Call me at 401-222-0659 with questions. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be setting up the snacks!

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: Book Club Meeting : Naomi Wolfe THE END OF AMERICA
